data.title: City of Norman, OK
data.meta_description: Plan ahead and look through a list of events the Parks and Recreation department puts on throughout the year. Plan ahead or purchase your tickets!
data.text:
Outdoor Movies Series

The Outdoor Movie Series are movie nights at Lions Park presented by Armstrong Bank with a host of different family friendly movies. Series begins in summer and fall on various dates.

Check Latest Event Schedule

@ Legacy Event Series

The Legacy Park is an outdoor event space that is used for special events of all kinds.

Check Latest Event Schedule

Norman's 4th Fest

The city celebrate Norman Day and Independence Day on July 4th each year with family-friendly activities, a crawling contest, music, food trucks, and fireworks. The day starts at 5 pm and the always amazing fireworks show begins at 9:45 pm.

Check Latest Event Schedule

Zombie Run

Run, jump or crawl your way from zombies in an off-road 5K in the woods of Ruby Grant Park or frolic in the family friendly 1-mile fun run. After the race, enjoy snacks, fun and dancing under the stars!

Veterans Day Celebration

Norman honors its veterans with a Veteran's Day Parade and Memorial Ceremony the Sunday before the holiday. The parade starts at the OU Stephenson Research Center and continues north on Jenkins Avenue to the Veterans Memorial, located at Reaves Park.

Check Latest Event Schedule

Andrews Park Tree Lighting

The city holds a special community tree lighting starting at Andrews Park and ending at the central library. There is caroling, craft, snacks, and holiday fun. This fun event is in early December.

Check Latest Event Schedule

Winterfest

To get in the Christmas spirit, Norman gets together and celebrates with Winterfest at Legacy Park! Winterfest is held in early December from

5:30 pm- 7:30 pm with a special fireworks show at the end of the event.

Check Latest Event Schedule

Daddy Daughter Dance

Easter Egg Hunt

The city holds a community Easter Egg Hunt every year on the Friday before Easter at Andrews Park. Activities start at 5:30pm and the Egg Hunt begins at 6:30pm.

Check Latest Event Schedule
